summary:
Seascape Network - Seascape Network is a gaming platform with a focus on bringing true fun and working infrastructure to the web3 space.

 BLOCKLORDS - The most ambitious player-driven medieval grand strategy game of our age

 Mini miners - A resource management strategy game designed for web3

 Profit Circus - Lock tokens and win rewards!

 NFT Brawl - Seascape's second modular game.

 Staking Saloon - Seascape's Third modular Web3 game.

 NFT Marketplace - Available on ETH, BSC & Moonriver
